Text:
Any book on this subject of that size can only contain the usual tips:
Listen to her.
Stop staring at her breasts.
Talk to her about subjects that she finds interesting.
STOP staring at her breasts.
Give her expensive stuff that she wants (when in doubt see point one)

When you start reading books about how to do, then you really need stop sitting infront of your computer. After a while you might actually understand that you learn about women much better if you go out and take a look at them.
   Just a tip
